helpgrid.innerhtml: The first table displays Price and Cost information for the current Work Order and all of its tasks. The second table displays Price and Cost information for the entire Work Order hierarchy starting from the current Work Order.

The Total Bill Price can be a projected price it does not mean that the work order has been attached to a Bill Batch. The Resource and Service Actual Costs include unapproved transactions. The View Costs dialogue box shows only approved transactions.
You can apply your changes to the current work order, or select Apply to Work Pack to change the values on the current work order and on all related records.
This table displays a list of PMs that require alerting. Select PMs to create Work Orders.
